DataElement.preferredDefinition: The Bowel Symptom Score for EPIC-CP.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice Questionnaire EPIC-CP - Bowel Symptom Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale developed by Chang et al in 2011, which is used to measure urinary incontinence, urinary irritation, and the bowel, sexual and hormonal health related quality of life in patients with prostate cancer. This instrument contains 16 items._Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice (EPIC-CP) Bowel symptom score.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Clinicians: Add the answers from questions 6a-6c to calculate the Bowel Symptom Score (out of 12)
